name: CookTale
description:
COOKTALE : kill the cook is a students project, made for our Game-2D cursus at LISAA in Paris.

I took the liberty of making some quality-of-life changes for the public release even after the exams passed. Please let me know if you're facing any issue.

Currently, the game is multiplayer only, but I have AI prototypes in stash that I plan to add later so you can try it solo.

« While seeking an inexhaustible source of food, four cooks sneak into an oversized castle. They eventually find themselves a giant bag of magic beans, but they are selfish, and too greedy for their own good; as they fight each other over the loot, one of them accidentally spills over the bag, spreading the beans over the entire castle. The unfortunate one is struck with a curse that turns them into a ghost, and forces them to try and kill their consorts in order to reclaim their humanity.
Which one of them will make it out of there with the most beans ? »
